short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize distribution of DOM nodes in the document tree

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visualize the distribution of DOM element nodes within the document tree of any web page. 
You have the ability to generate interactive tree views for any element, just like inspecting an element using the DevTools element inspector.
